TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in FAC . He was an employee of the “ GPE ” PERSON ( “ the Company ” ; ORG “ NORP ” ) . The “ Ukrrudprom ” ORG ( ДВАТ « Укррудпром DATE ) owned PERCENT of the ORG 's share capital .

CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant instituted civil proceedings in the GPE District Court of Kryvyy Rig ( NORP районний суд PERSON PERSON ) , seeking his reinstatement as an overman ( гірничий майстер ) and compensatory redress for allegedly unlawful dismissal .

CARDINAL . On DATE the court ordered the applicant 's reinstatement and partly allowed his claims for compensation , having awarded him CARDINAL hryvnyas ( ORG ) . The Company appealed , but reinstated the applicant .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG upheld the applicant 's reinstatement , however , recalculated the compensation and awarded him ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL . The judgment was not appealed against in cassation within the statutory time - limit and became final .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG ( ORG виконавчої служби PERSON району м. PERSON ) instituted the enforcement proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE the enforcement proceedings were stayed on account of the pending bankruptcy proceedings against the Company .
CARDINAL . On DATE the enforcement proceedings were resumed , as the bankruptcy proceedings had been discontinued .
CARDINAL . In DATE the judgment given in the applicant 's favour was enforced .
CARDINAL . A description of the relevant domestic law can be found in ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § CARDINAL , DATE ) .
